archiefmat.scope: Contains texts of manumission deeds. Volumes nos. 1005-1007 include an alphabetical register on name of manumitter. In no. 1005 an overview is given recording name of manumitter, names of slaves to be manumitted, the name of the own, the date of the notarial deed, date set for manumission and eventual remarks. No. 1008 is a register of dues paid for the petitions for manumission, listing names of both manumitter and manumittees.
archiefmat.notes: The data presented are based on a draft of the inventory of the archive (December 2008); numbers of the documents may change in the final version.
